duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze data to identify potential risks and problematic operations.
Consult with field and business teams to review Last Mile operations and provide recommendations.
Develop tools/dashboards/reports and other resources for stakeholders.
Lead the development of key performance indicator metric processing.
Provide continuous improvement of existing reports/dashboards/tools.
Conduct data analysis, research, and develops educational materials based on trends.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
